JSRDotNETSDK Reference

NOTIFY_TYPE Enumeration

See Also

Values that represent notify types. If the NotifyEventHandler event is subscribed to, the end application can get notifications of these types.

Namespace: JSRDotNETSDK
Assembly: JSRDotNETSDK (in JSRDotNETSDK.dll)

Members
  Member name Description
PULSER_RCVR_DISCOVERED A pulser receiver has been discovered and is available for use.
CURRENT_PULSER_RCVR_CHANGED The current pulser receiver has changed.
PULSER_RCVR_DETACH A pulser receiver has detached.
DISCOVERY_STARTED Instrument and Pulser/Receiver discovery has started. Usually occurs when the InstrumentDiscoveryEnable property is changed from false to true by the user application. The PluginName field is left as an empty string, as there is not a separate DISCOVER_STARTED for each plugin, but rather just one when SetDiscoveryEnable() enables discovery.
DISCOVERY_COMPLETE Instrument and Pulser/Receiver discovery is complete. When Instrument Discovery is changed from false to true by the user's application, the plugin will search for already-connected instruments. When finished scanning for already-connected instruments, this notification will occur. But it is important to note that if another instrument is connected to the computer after this, as long as InstrumentDiscoverEnable is still true, more Pulser_Rcvr_Discovered notifications may occur in the case of USB instruments or other non-serial port devices. In other words, DISCOVERY_COMPLETE does not necessarily mean that new devices will not be found (in the case of USB or other non-serial port connection type instruments.)
PROPERTY_CHANGE A property of a pulser receiver has changed.
STATE_CHANGE
ERROR An error occurred.
